/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the surroundings. The highway is teeming with vehicles, including cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Overhead, a large blue sign with white text stands out, providing direction for travelers. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, buildings and trees can be seen, adding to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the sign and the buildings in the background. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sign contrasting against the green of the trees and the various colors of the vehicles. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life and transportation in Beijing.
